org.pepstock.charba.client.positioner

Class NativeJsPositionerHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.positioner.NativeJsPositionerHelper

  • @JsType(isNative=true,
        name="CharbaJsPositionerHelper",
        namespace="<global>")
final class NativeJsPositionerHelper
extends Object
    This is a Java native object which is wrapping a CHARBA java script object implementation with some utilities to manage CHART.JS tooltips positioner.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private NativeJsPositionerHelper()
      To avoid any instantiation

      (package private) static NativeObject invoke(String name, NativeObject context, ArrayObject datasetItems, NativeObject eventPoint)
      Invokes an existing positioner to get the point.
      (package private) static void register(String name, CallbackProxy.Proxy object)
      Register the tooltips positioner to CHART.JS.
      (package private) static void unregister(String name)
      Unregister the tooltips positioner from CHART.JS.

    • Method Detail

      • register

        static void register(String name,
                     CallbackProxy.Proxy object)
        Register the tooltips positioner to CHART.JS.
        Parameters:
        name - name of new position
        object - callback to invoke the tolltip positioner

      • unregister

        static void unregister(String name)
        Unregister the tooltips positioner from CHART.JS.
        Parameters:
        name - name of position to be removed

      • invoke

        static NativeObject invoke(String name,
                           NativeObject context,
                           ArrayObject datasetItems,
                           NativeObject eventPoint)
        Invokes an existing positioner to get the point.
        Parameters:
        name - name of tooltips position to be invoked
        context - context value of this to the execution context of function.
        datasetItems - list of dataset items
        eventPoint - point on the canvas where the event occurred.
        Returns:
        the point calculated by positioner or null if positioner does not exist
